sets.description: Final damage increased by **10%/12%/14%/16%**, Xiaoqinglong's attack hits the target again, dealing damage equal to **450%** of ATK. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

When equipped with at least **1** volt weapon, all elemental damage is increased by **28%/32%/36%/40%**. When using Meng Zhang's skills/Combo skills, gain a **20%** crit damage increase for **30** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
